28.text:
renderFreeIconShape(
    ctx,
    visuals,
    element,
    buildRectCoords,
    undefined
)

33.text:
w = element.width / 2
h = element.height / 2
x = element.left + w
y = element.top + h

30.text:
ctx.fillStyle = ctx.strokeStyle
padding = h / 4
y0 = y - h + padding
y1 = y + h - padding
x0 = x - w + padding
x1 = x - w + h * 1.5
x2 = x + w - h * 1.5
x3 = x + w - padding
ctx.beginPath();
ctx.moveTo(x0, y)
ctx.lineTo(x1, y0)
ctx.lineTo(x1, y1)
ctx.closePath()
ctx.fill()
ctx.beginPath();
ctx.moveTo(x2, y0)
ctx.lineTo(x3, y)
ctx.lineTo(x2, y1)
ctx.closePath()
ctx.fill()
